LearningItemAssignment.name: LearningItemAssignment
LearningItemAssignment.description: Represents the assignment of a Learning Paths entry to users or groups or the enrollment of an Enablement program for a specific user.

AssigneeId.description: The ID of the user or group assigned to the learning item. This field is a relationship field.

AssignmentStatus.description: The status of assigning an Enablement program to a user. Possible values are: Failed InProgress Succeeded

DueDate.description: The date that the assignment is due for the user or group.

EnrollmentType.description: The type of enrollment for a user in an Enablement program. Possible values are: Assigned SelfEnrolled

IsOverdue.description: Indicates whether the assigned learning item is overdue (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

LearningItemId.description: The ID of the learning item. This field is a relationship field.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who assigned the learning item. This field is a polymorphic relationship field.

ProgressId.description: The ID of record that represents a user's progress towards completing an assigned learning item, such as a Learning Paths entry or sales program. This field is a relationship field.

StartDate.description: The date that the learning item was assigned to the user or group.

LearningItemAssignment.accessRules: a supported Partner Relationship Management (PRM) add-on license
